descriptions: The red color on all delete/clear/decline buttons is now customizable in colors.css under --danger.
Added help text when right-clicking an animation while using /animpos. All keys and text can now be edited in config.lua under Config.AnimPos.
The menu now caches your last position. If you open a category like 'Dances', scroll halfway, close the menu, it will reopen at the same spot instead of resetting.
Added ShouldHold option in resource/src/client/modules/handsup.lua, allowing hands-up to be hold-to-raise or toggle mode.
Fixed issue where animation GIFs wouldnâ€™t show in the sequence creator.
Fixed bug where selecting a walking style, switching to default, and relogging still kept the old walking style.
Fixed issue where disabling 'Show GIF' did nothing.
Fixed issue where closing settings and pressing spacebar reopened settings.
